circumstances:
Crashed in unknown circumstances in Owston Ferry, killing all four crew members. 
Crew:
Sgt Arthur Stuart Dalgress, pilot,
Sgt David Kinnaird Mills, pilot,
Sgt William Claude Goldsmith, wireless operator, 
Sgt Roy Fleming Wilson, wireless operator.
probable_cause: It is believed that the pilot lost control of the airplane after being dazzled by searchlights.
